name: pokemonizer
description: fetches an image and composes apokemon on top of it

NODE_ENV.description: recommended to be set to "production"; required to activate Rollbar and NewRelic; enforces HTTPS only.

GITHUB_AUTH_TOKEN.description: This token is used by the netrc buildpack to access private GitHub repositories. See https://github.com/heroku/heroku-buildpack-github-netrc .
